title: Kalsubai Trek - Chasing the First Light
description: Join MIT Adventure Club for an exciting trek to Maharashtra's highest peak. Experience breathtaking sunrise views, challenging trails, and unforgettable memories with fellow adventurers. Perfect for both beginners and experienced trekkers.

title: Tech Innovation Workshop
description: Learn about cutting-edge technologies including AI, Machine Learning, and Blockchain. Hands-on sessions with industry experts, networking opportunities, and project showcase. Open to all students interested in technology.

title: Cultural Diversity Festival
description: Celebrate the rich cultural diversity of our campus community. Enjoy traditional music, dance performances, international cuisine, and cultural exhibitions. A day filled with unity, celebration, and learning about different cultures.

title: Annual Career Fair 2025
description: Connect with top employers from various industries. Attend career counseling sessions, resume workshops, and interview preparation seminars. Great opportunity to explore career paths and secure internships or job offers.

title: Inter-College Sports Tournament
description: Compete in various sports including cricket, football, basketball, and athletics. Represent your college and showcase your sporting talent. Exciting prizes, trophies, and recognition for winners.

title: Academic Excellence Seminar
description: Learn effective study strategies, time management techniques, and academic success tips from experienced professors and successful alumni. Interactive sessions with Q&A opportunities.

title: Student Art Exhibition
description: Showcase your artistic talents and appreciate the creative works of fellow students. Various art forms including painting, photography, digital art, and sculptures. Open for public viewing and voting.

title: Startup Pitch Competition
description: Present your innovative business ideas to industry experts and win exciting prizes. Get feedback from successful entrepreneurs, network with investors, and potentially secure funding for your startup.

title: Environmental Awareness Workshop
description: Learn about sustainability practices and how to make a positive impact on the environment. Hands-on activities, expert talks, and practical tips for eco-friendly living.

title: International Food Festival
description: Taste cuisines from around the world and celebrate cultural diversity through food. Cooking demonstrations, food competitions, and cultural performances. A gastronomic journey across continents.

title: Coding Hackathon 2025
description: 24-hour coding challenge to solve real-world problems. Work in teams, learn new technologies, and compete for exciting prizes. Mentorship from industry professionals and networking opportunities.

title: Photography Workshop
description: Learn photography fundamentals, composition techniques, and post-processing skills. Hands-on practice with professional equipment and guidance from experienced photographers.

title: Yoga and Meditation Retreat
description: Reconnect with yourself through yoga, meditation, and mindfulness practices. Learn stress management techniques and improve mental well-being in a peaceful environment.

title: Debate Competition
description: Sharpen your public speaking and critical thinking skills. Compete in teams on current topics and win recognition for your debating prowess.

title: Music Concert - Campus Idol
description: Showcase your musical talent in front of a live audience. Solo and group performances, professional judging, and exciting prizes for winners.
